abstract: Stocks gain on rising drug and consumer shares.

headline.print_headline: Consumer and Drug Shares Nudge the Market Higher
headline.main: Consumer and Drug Shares Nudge the Market Higher

snippet: Bond yields inched higher, but remained close to record lows as investors sought safety after Britain’s vote to leave the European Union....
lead_paragraph: Bond yields inched higher, but remained close to record lows as investors sought safety after Britain’s vote to leave the European Union.
